attachments.fallback:
<@U034ZF8M56X>: Hi, I want to report a new Good Chop issue. Please check the details.
*Issue:* `Voucher Error Notification Banner`
*Topic:* `E2E Test / Unit Test`
*Priority:* `Medium priority ðŸŸ¡`
*Description:* `Hi team, I'm updating some E2E tests and need your help to understand the expected behaviour. 

The voucher error notification banner only displays when either:
It's NOT in a reactivation route, OR
It's in a reactivation route AND both conditions are met:
reactivationVoucherCode exists
isReactivationVoucherReplacementEnabled is true

Recent changes have removed the voucher replacement flow for GoodChop by setting reactivationvoucherreplacement RCS flag to false, causing PR tests to fail that expect the voucher error notification to appear when an invalid voucher is used during reactivation.

Is it intentional that GoodChop no longer shows voucher error notifications when reactivationvoucherreplacement is disabled?`
*Expected behaviour:* `Voucher notifiation banner to appear`
*Actual behaviour:* `Voucher notification banner does not appear`
*Category:* squad-nv-good-chop
*Command:* goodchop-issue

_thread_replies.text: Hi <@U034ZF8M56X>, few weeks ago when we were testing something on Reactivation page (on Staging) we decided to turned this off to keep consistency with what we have on live environment where we don't have this voucher error notification, so yes it is intentional that we don't have it on Staging now either

elements.text: , few weeks ago when we were testing something on Reactivation page (on Staging) we decided to turned this off to keep consistency with what we have on live environment where we don't have this voucher error notification, so yes it is intentional that we don't have it on Staging now either

_thread_replies.text: Thanks for confirming, Iâ€™ll update our tests.

attachments.fallback:
<@U01PE2S4ZL6>: Hi, I'd like to ask a question! Please check the details.
*Question title:* `Refinement of a code post CDPS migration in reschedule delivery flow (calendar)`
*Topic:* `Code Review`
*Details:* `<https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/60749>

Hey, we have discovered a gap that needs to be addressed when rescheduling delivery. CDPS will change delivery option globally for all the weeks, not just the week that is being rescheduled. For that reason we want to maintain the delivery option in CDPS payload, and there is a follow-up one-off request that will overwrite delivery option for a specific week that is being rescheduled.

This code is shared between KN and MR, please let us know if you see any issues with that change.`

*Category:* squad-nv-good-chop
*Command:* goodchop-question
attachments.text:
<@U01PE2S4ZL6>: Hi, I'd like to ask a question! Please check the details.
*Question title:* `Refinement of a code post CDPS migration in reschedule delivery flow (calendar)`
*Topic:* `Code Review`
*Details:* `<https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/60749>

Hey, we have discovered a gap that needs to be addressed when rescheduling delivery. CDPS will change delivery option globally for all the weeks, not just the week that is being rescheduled. For that reason we want to maintain the delivery option in CDPS payload, and there is a follow-up one-off request that will overwrite delivery option for a specific week that is being rescheduled.

This code is shared between KN and MR, please let us know if you see any issues with that change.`

*Category:* squad-nv-good-chop
*Command:* goodchop-question
